short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quick and easy to use extension to see the weather forecast

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quick and easy to use extension to see the weather forecast, current project to get to know how Extensions work, might get some updates in the future.

Mainly a portfolio project.
